bibl.title: Four Michigan Papyri of Classical Greek Authors.
bibl.note: 1. 4270. Hesiod, Theogony 809-826, 834-851. Parchment codex. Prov. unkn. (Fayum?), iv or v A.D. - 2. 6585 a. Soph., Antigone 297-308. Prov. unkn. (Oxy.?), i B.C. or early i A.D. - 3. 6789. Thucyd. I, 62, 3-4; 63, 2-64, 1. Prov. unkn., late i or ii A.D. - 4. 3755. Isocr., Panegyricus (Or. IV) 14-16. Oxyrhynchus, iii A.D.
bibl.seg: Renner Timothy T., Four Michigan Papyri of Classical Greek Authors.
ZPE 29 (1978) pp. 5-28 et pl. X c, d.
